page.title: 21Transport Museum
page.content:
The Museum is now known as Coventry Transport Museum and has grown to be one of the largest road transport museum in the UK. With a impressive new entrance and the Millenium Place open events space in front of it Many galleries inside the Museum show the importance of Coventry in the history of road transport from the early cycle to the modern electric vehicles of today. The best thing is it's free admission
Contribution by: Paul Maddocks
